title: YouTube Video Summarizer
description: Generate structured summaries of YouTube videos with key points, timestamps, and actionable insights

content.text:
## TASK
Summarize the YouTube video transcript provided by the user, focusing on key takeaways and actionable insights.

## INPUTS
- Video URL: {{video_url}}
- Summary Style: {{summary_style}}
- Max Length: {{max_length}}

## CONSTRAINTS
- Focus on main ideas and actionable takeaways
- Use timestamps when available in the transcript
- Maintain objectivity and accuracy
- Adapt tone to match {{summary_style}}
- Keep summary within {{max_length}} constraint

## OUTPUT FORMAT
Return a structured summary with these sections:

1. **Title and Channel**
   - Video title
   - Channel name

2. **Overview** (2-3 sentences)
   - High-level summary of the video's purpose

3. **Key Points** (bullet list with timestamps)
   - [00:00] Introduction and context
   - [02:30] Main point 1
   - [05:15] Main point 2
   - etc.

4. **Actionable Insights** (numbered list)
   - Concrete takeaways viewers can apply

5. **Tags/Categories**
   - Relevant topic tags

## QUALITY CHECKS
- [ ] All timestamps are accurate and match the transcript
- [ ] Key points are distinct and non-overlapping
- [ ] Summary length matches {{max_length}} constraint
- [ ] Tone is consistent with {{summary_style}}
- [ ] Actionable insights are concrete and practical
